london_events.title: Mary Ann Nichols
london_events.description: First canonical victim found in Buck's Row

london_events.title: Annie Chapman
london_events.description: Second canonical victim found in Hanbury Street

london_events.title: 'Dear Boss' Letter
london_events.description: Famous letter signed 'Jack the Ripper' received

london_events.title: Double Event (Stride/Eddowes)
london_events.description: Two murders in one night: Elizabeth Stride and Catherine Eddowes

london_events.title: 'Saucy Jacky' Postcard
london_events.description: Postcard received claiming credit for the 'double event'

london_events.title: Lusk 'From Hell' Letter
london_events.description: Letter with preserved kidney sent to George Lusk

london_events.title: Mary Jane Kelly
london_events.description: Final canonical victim, found in Miller's Court
